posts.post_content:
I have several 1911 T332 Helmar Stamps duplicates that I would like to sell and/or trade.  I am the proud owner of a complete set of the Helmar baseball stamp series, but could use a handful of upgrades.  The ones shown in the link below are my duplicates.

[url]https://imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras[/url]

Reach out if you want to trade or want to buy anything shown here.  Most are lower condition, but there are a few gems in the group, like the Johnny Evers shown below.  I've also included some additional eye candy.  These are all around the same size, but show up as larger or smaller depending on how I crop the scans (i.e., the amount of black space surrounding the stamp).

PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras/large/1911%20Evers%20_2_.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras/websize/1911%20Beck%20_2_.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras/websize/1911%20Block.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras/websize/1911%20Griffith%20_2__1.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras/websize/1911%20Hoblitzell.jpg[/IMG]

Bump.  I have added prices on my site for all of my remaining stamps.  Don’t be shy.  Reach out.  I’ve made a handful of “no hassle” sales over the past few weeks.  Wouldn’t mind doing a few more.

Thanks,
Derek

Bump…made a few more sales and have made additional price cuts on everything that’s remaining.  

Take a look at the link in the first post to see all the stamps that are available.  I will gladly give a sizeable discount if you purchase multiple!
